titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Katharine A. Lawrie, 2015 April; machine-readable finding aid created by Katharine A. Lawrie, 2015 April.

address.addressline: Room A1713, Charles E. Young Research Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2015-04-06T12:04-0700

did.abstract: Record Series 641 contains records generated by the Department of English at the University of California, Los Angeles between 1969 and 1983.

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: University of California, Los Angeles. Department of English.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: COLLECTION STORED OFF-SITE AT SRLF: Open for research. Advance notice required for access. Contact the UCLA Library Special Collections Reference Desk for paging information.
Portions of Record Series 641 are restricted and not open for research. See folder descriptions for more information.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Copyright of portions of this collection has been assigned to The Regents of the University of California. The UCLA University Archives can grant permission to publish for materials to which it holds the copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], English Department. Records (University Archives Record Series 641). UCLA Library Special Collections, University Archives.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Record Series 641 contains records generated by the Department of English at the University of California, Los Angeles between 1969 and 1983. Files regard the Composition Section, personnel, budgets, and other operations of the department.
This is an active record series; additional University records are expected to be added.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access note
accessrestrict.p: Folder 9 is restricted and not open for research until 2053.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access note
accessrestrict.p: Folder 10 is restricted and not open for research until 2058.
